Stupefied by the being standing before him, Vlad has to control 
himself almost unbearably to leave his weapons down...

Vlad: I am Khan Vladimir Ward of Clan Wolf. What are you?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> ?????
> 
> 
> The Pod's door opened and a fenemine shape emerged "Who're you???" 
> she said
> 
>

> > OOC: No, I plan him to go with whomever gets there first.
> >

> >

> in, 
> > he examined the pod.
> > 
> > Vlad: What is that thing? It is not a projectile of any sort... It 
> > lacks any propulsors or warhead. It seems more like... an escape 
> > shuttle.
> > 
> > He sees a computer pad and many electronic devices that he does 
not

> > technology, much less human...
> >

> what
